entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. POP 30%
